nodes.text: Brooke Vitale (born Dworkin) is an American children's book author and editor. She has written and edited a number of Star Wars young readers books under the Disney–Lucasfilm Press banner.
Brooke Vitale is an American children's book author and editor. Vitale is credited with work on a number of Star Wars titles published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.

In July 2010, Vitale joined Disney Publishing Worldwide as a Senior Editor. After the acquisition of Lucasfilm Ltd. by The Walt Disney Company in 2012, Star Wars books began to be published by Disney Publishing Worldwide under the Disney–Lucasfilm Press banner. Between 2014 and 2018, Vitale oversaw the development of a variety of Star Wars young readers titles and wrote several of them herself, including several stories collected in the Star Wars Rebels: Storybook Library.

In January 2018, after the birth of her children, Vitale left her position at Disney Publishing and transitioned to freelance editing and writing. She continues to write Star Wars books for Disney–Lucasfilm Press, including several young readers titles in The Mandalorian publishing program.
